sqlGroup.name: car
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT dbc.*,ddc.*,dcb.`name` bname,dcm.name mname FROM dele_base_car dbc INNER JOIN dele_driver_car ddc ON ddc.car = dbc.id LEFT JOIN dele_car_brand dcb ON dcb.id = dbc.brand LEFT JOIN dele_car_model dcm ON dcm.id = dbc.model_type WHERE ddc.driver = ? AND dbc.`status` = ?

SELECT dbc.color,dbc.picture,dbc.id,dbc.plate_no plateNo, dcb.`name` brandName, dcm.`name` modelName FROM dele_base_car dbc INNER JOIN dele_driver_car ddc ON ddc.car = dbc.id INNER JOIN dele_car_model dcm ON dbc.model_type = dcm.id INNER JOIN dele_car_brand dcb ON dbc.brand = dcb.id WHERE ddc.driver = ? AND ddc.use_flag = 1
SELECT id FROM dele_base_car WHERE VIN = ? LIMIT 1
SELECT id FROM dele_base_car WHERE plate_no = ? LIMIT 1
